name: Chaos Arena (FatalForcesXXX, GoldenKing6, Mr. Sniffles)
description:
IMPORTANT:

BUG MAKES IT SO THAT SECOND TIME YOU PLAY AFTER STARTING NEW GAME ALL YOUR SAVE DATA IS DELETED AND YOU ARE AUTOMATICALLY REDIRECTED TO FOREST EVEN IF YOU SELECTED A DIFFERENT STAGE. AS SOON AS YOU DIE YOU ARE NOT ALLOWED TO CONTINUE AND HAVE TO START A NEW GAME. 

ALSO THE GAME SOFTLOCKS OFTEN. ENTERING THE FOREST AND DYING AND RETURNING TO MENU GUARANTEES A SOFTLOCK. TEMPLE SOFTLOCKS EVERY FEW GAMES AND VOLCANO SOFTLOCKS THE LEAST. REFRESH THE PAGE IF THIS HAPPENS.

CURRENT WORKAROUND: ALWAYS START A NEW GAME INSTEAD OF PRESSING CONTINUE AND REFREESH THE PAGE WHEN A SOFTLOCK OCCURS

Description

You are in an arena without a way to escape, no weapon yet, and no means of fighting... DEFLECT the Enemy bullets to survive in this chaotic bullet hell and collect powerups to help you. USE THE ENVIRONMENT around you to help deal massive damage (lava and falling trees and columns). Three Maps, no time limit, let's see who gets the highest score! Oh right, and enemies have elements so look out to deflect bullets from an enemy which has an element stronger than another enemy towards that one enemy: Fire beats Nature which beats Wind which beats Fire, simple enough, elements are colour coded on slimes.

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

Z or Left Mouse Button - Shoot (When using bow and arrow powerup)

Z or Left Mouse Button - Explode (When using bomb powerup)

Shift - Dash

Mouse Cursor - Move Deflector

PowerUps

Bow And Arrow - Shoot Arrows to deal damage to enemies

Speed Boost - Go faster

Invulnerability - You are shielded from damage from as long as you have this

Bomb - Kill nearby enemies, useful in a tight situation

Credits

Music by Mr Sniffles

Code by FatalForcesXXX

Art by FatalForcesXXX and GoldenKing

Software Used
